name: processing_level
label: Processing level
help: Processing Level 3 means that data were mapped on a uniform space-time horizontal grid. Completeness is not guaranteed, meaning that some gaps are to be expected. Processing Level 4 means that data were produced from an assimilation of lower level data into a numerical model. In this case data are mapped in a regular space-time grid and gaps are not to be expected.

name: variable
label: Variable
help: Please consult the variables table on the overview page for more information on these variables.

labels.mole_concentration_of_ozone_in_air: Mole concentration of ozone in air
labels.mole_fraction_of_ozone_in_air: Mole fraction of ozone in air
labels.anomaly_of_mole_concentration_of_ozone_i: Anomaly of mole concentration of ozone in air
labels.mole_content_of_ozone_in_atmosphere_laye: Mole content of ozone in atmosphere layer

name: vertical_aggregation
label: Vertical aggregation
help: Total column refers to the vertical integration of the atmosphere mole content of ozone from surface to the top of the atmosphere. Tropospheric column refers to the vertical integration from the surface up to 6 km of altitude. Vertical profiles refer to values of ozone variables specified at different vertical levels of the atmosphere. For more details, please consult the product user guide in the documentation section

name: sensor
label: Sensor
help: Single and merged sensors list. Information on the characteristics can be found in the documentation.

labels.msr: MSR (Merge of 15 sensors using gap-filling assimilation methods)
labels.merged_uv: MERGED-UV (Combination of 5 nadir UV sensors GOME, GOME2-A, GOME2-B, OMI and SCIAMACHY)
labels.merged_np: MERGED-NP (Merge of the 5 vertical profiles products from UV sensors GOME, GOME2-A, GOME2-B, OMI and SCIAMACHY)
labels.allg: ALLG      (Latitude-longitude gridded merged anomaly product from limb sensors GOMOS, MIPAS, OSIRIS and SCIAMACHY)
labels.cllg: CLLG      (Latitude-longitude gridded merged concentration product from limb sensors GOMOS, MIPAS, OSIRIS and SCIAMACHY)
labels.amzm: AMZM      (Monthly zonal mean merged anomaly product from limb sensors ACE, GOMOS, MIPAS, OMPS, OSIRIS, SAGE-2 and SCIAMACHY)
labels.cmzm: CMZM      (Monthly zonal mean merged concentration product from limb sensors ACE, GOMOS, MIPAS, OMPS, OSIRIS, SAGE-2 and SCIAMACHY)
labels.gome: GOME (Global Ozone Monitoring Experiment-I onboard ERS2)
labels.gome2_a: GOME2-A (Global Ozone Monitoring Experiment-II onboard METOP-A)
labels.gome2_b: GOME2-B (Global Ozone Monitoring Experiment-II onboard METOP-B)
labels.gome2_c: GOME2-C (Global Ozone Monitoring Experiment-II onboard METOP-C)
labels.gomos: GOMOS (Global Ozone Monitoring by Occultation of Stars onboard ENVISAT)
labels.iasi_a_day_time: IASI-A day time (Infrared Atmospheric Sounding Interferometer onboard METOP-A)
labels.iasi_a_night_time: IASI-A night time (Infrared Atmospheric Sounding Interferometer onboard METOP-A)
labels.iasi_b_day_time: IASI-B day time (Infrared Atmospheric Sounding Interferometer onboard METOP-B)
labels.iasi_b_night_time: IASI-B night time (Infrared Atmospheric Sounding Interferometer onboard METOP-B)
labels.iasi_c_day_time: IASI-C day time (Infrared Atmospheric Sounding Interferometer onboard METOP-C)
labels.iasi_c_night_time: IASI-C night time (Infrared Atmospheric Sounding Interferometer onboard METOP-C)
labels.mipas: MIPAS (Michelson Interferometer for Passive Atmospheric Sounding onboard ENVISAT)
labels.omi: OMI (Ozone Monitoring Instrument  on board  AURA)
labels.omps: OMPS (Ozone Mapping Profiler Suite on board NPP )
labels.osiris: OSIRIS (Optical Spectrograph and InfraRed Imager System  onboard ODIN)
labels.saber: SABER (Sounding of the Atmosphere using Broadband Emission Radiometry on board  TIMED)
labels.sage_2: SAGE-2 (Stratospheric Aerosol and Gas Experiment II onboard  ERBS)
labels.sage_3: SAGE-3 (Stratospheric Aerosol and Gas Experiment III onboard  ISS)
labels.sciamachy: SCIAMACHY (Scanning Imaging Absorption Spectrometer for Atmospheric Cartography on board ENVISAT)
labels.tropomi: TROPOMI (Tropospheric Monitoring Instrument on board Sentinel-5P)

name: algorithm
label: Algorithm
help: This choice is not available for most of the sensors. Information on the different algorithms can be found in the documenation.

name: version
label: Version
help: The characteristics of different versions is given on the overview page and further documented for each product in the documentation.
